options.name: public
options.description: Send the information page publicly. Disabled by default.

options.name: public
options.description: Send the help message publicly. Disabled by default.

options.name: content
options.description: The content of the confession. Leave empty to open a modal for multi-line messages.

options.name: attachment
options.description: A file to attach to the confession.

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel to which all confession logs and approval requests will be sent.

options.name: label
options.description: A label to use for the confession. Defaults to `Confession`.

options.name: color
options.description: A hex-encoded RGB color to use for highlighting confession embeds.

options.name: approval
options.description: Sets whether approval is required before confession publication in this channel. Defaults to false.

name: lockdown
description: Temporarily disable confessions for this channel. Previous settings are remembered.

name: resend
description: Resend a confession by its ID. This is useful when the original message was accidentally deleted.
